00037 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038  * (function: create_node_w_type)
00039  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 ast_node_t* create_node_w_type(short id, int line_number, int file_number)
00041 {
00042         static long unique_count = 0;
00043 
00044 //      oassert(unique_count != 198);
00045 
00046         ast_node_t* new_node;
00047 
00048         new_node = (ast_node_t*)calloc(1, sizeof(ast_node_t));
00049         oassert(new_node != NULL);
00050         new_node->type = id;
00051         
00052         new_node->children = NULL;
00053         new_node->num_children = 0;
00054 
00055         new_node->line_number = line_number;
00056         new_node->file_number = file_number;
00057         new_node->unique_count = unique_count++;
00058 
00059         return new_node;
00060 }
00061 
00062 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063  * (function: free_child_in_tree)
00064  * frees all children below too
00065  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 void free_child_in_tree(ast_node_t *from, int idx_removal)
00067 {
00068         ast_node_t *child = from->children[idx_removal];
00069         int i;
00070         
00071         if ((child == NULL) || (child->shared_node == TRUE))
00072                 return;
00073         
00074         /* free all it's children .... and so on recursively */
00075         for (i = 0; i < child->num_children; i++)
00076         {
00077                 free_child_in_tree(child->children[i], i);      
00078         }
00079         
00080         if (child->children != NULL)
00081                 free(child->children);
00082 
00083         switch(child->type)
00084         {
00085                 case IDENTIFIERS:
00086                         if (child->types.identifier != NULL)
00087                                 free(child->types.identifier);
00088                         break;
00089                 case NUMBERS:
00090                         if (child->types.number.number != NULL)
00091                                 free(child->types.number.number);
00092                         break;
00093         }
00094 
00095         free(child);    
00096         from->children[idx_removal] = NULL;
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100  * (function: free_ast_node)
00101  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 void free_ast_node(ast_node_t *child)
00103 {
00104         int i;
00105         
00106         if ((child == NULL) || (child->shared_node == TRUE))
00107                 return;
00108         
00109         /* free all it's children .... and so on recursively */
00110         for (i = 0; i < child->num_children; i++)
00111         {
00112                 free_child_in_tree(child, i);   
00113         }
00114         
00115         if (child->children != NULL)
00116                 free(child->children);
00117 
00118         switch(child->type)
00119         {
00120                 case IDENTIFIERS:
00121                         if (child->types.identifier != NULL)
00122                                 free(child->types.identifier);
00123                         break;
00124                 case NUMBERS:
00125                         if (child->types.number.number != NULL)
00126                                 free(child->types.number.number);
00127                         break;
00128         }
00129 
00130         free(child);    
00131 }
00132 
00133 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00134  * (function: free_ast_node_only)
00135  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00136 void free_ast_node_only(ast_node_t *child)
00137 {
00138         if (child->children != NULL)
00139                 free(child->children);
00140 
00141         switch(child->type)
00142         {
00143                 case IDENTIFIERS:
00144                         if (child->types.identifier != NULL)
00145                                 free(child->types.identifier);
00146                         break;
00147                 case NUMBERS:
00148                         if (child->types.number.number != NULL)
00149                                 free(child->types.number.number);
00150                         break;
00151         }
00152 
00153         free(child);    
00154 }

00158  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00159 ast_node_t* create_tree_node_id(char* string, int line_number, int file_number)
00160 {
00161         ast_node_t* new_node = create_node_w_type(IDENTIFIERS, line_number, current_parse_file);
00162         new_node->types.identifier = string;
00163 
00164         return new_node;
00165 }

00167 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168  * (function: *create_tree_node_long_long_number)
00169  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00170 ast_node_t *create_tree_node_long_long_number(long long number, int line_number, int file_number)
00171 {
00172         ast_node_t* new_node = create_node_w_type(NUMBERS, line_number, current_parse_file);
00173         new_node->types.number.base = LONG_LONG;
00174         new_node->types.number.value = number;
00175 
00176         return new_node;
00177 }

00179 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180  * (function: create_tree_node_number)
00181  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00182 ast_node_t *create_tree_node_number(char* number, int line_number, int file_number)
00183 {
00184         ast_node_t* new_node = create_node_w_type(NUMBERS, line_number, current_parse_file);
00185         char *string_pointer = number;
00186         int index_string_pointer = 0;
00187         char *temp_string;
00188 
00189         /* find the ' character if it's a base */
00190         for (string_pointer=number; *string_pointer; string_pointer++) 
00191         {
00192                 if (*string_pointer == '\'') 
00193                 {
00194                         break;
00195                 }
00196                 index_string_pointer++;
00197         }
00198 
00199         if (index_string_pointer == strlen(number))
00200         {
00201                 /* this is base d */
00202                 new_node->types.number.base = DEC;
00203                 /* reset to the front */
00204                 string_pointer = number;
00205 
00206                 /* size is the rest of the string */
00207                 new_node->types.number.size = strlen((string_pointer));
00208                 /* assign the remainder of the number to a string */
00209                 new_node->types.number.number = strdup((string_pointer));
00210         }       
00211         else
00212         {
00213                 /* there is a base in the form: number[bhod]'number */
00214                 switch(tolower(*(string_pointer+1)))
00215                 {
00216                         case 'd':
00217                                 new_node->types.number.base = DEC;
00218                                 break;
00219                         case 'h':
00220                                 new_node->types.number.base = HEX;
00221                                 break;
00222                         case 'o':
00223                                 new_node->types.number.base = OCT;
00224                                 break;
00225                         case 'b':
00226                                 new_node->types.number.base = BIN;
00227                                 break;
00228                         default:
00229                                 printf("Not a number\n");
00230                                 oassert(FALSE);
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 /* check if the size matches the design specified size */
00234                 temp_string = strdup(number); 
00235                 temp_string[index_string_pointer] = '\0';
00236                 /* size is the rest of the string */
00237                 new_node->types.number.size = atoi(temp_string); 
00238                 free(temp_string);
00239         
00240                 /* move to the digits */
00241                 string_pointer += 2;
00242 
00243                 /* assign the remainder of the number to a string */
00244                 new_node->types.number.number = strdup((string_pointer));
00245         }
00246 
00247         /* size describes how may bits */
00248         new_node->types.number.binary_size = new_node->types.number.size;
00249         /* add in the values for all the numbers */
00250         switch (new_node->types.number.base)
00251         {
00252                 case(DEC):
00253                         new_node->types.number.value = convert_dec_string_of_size_to_long(new_node->types.number.number, new_node->types.number.size);
00254                         new_node->types.number.binary_string = convert_long_to_bit_string(new_node->types.number.value, new_node->types.number.binary_size);
00255                         break;
00256                 case(HEX):
00257                         new_node->types.number.value = convert_hex_string_of_size_to_long(new_node->types.number.number, strlen(new_node->types.number.number));
00258                         new_node->types.number.binary_string = convert_long_to_bit_string(new_node->types.number.value, new_node->types.number.binary_size);
00259                         break;
00260                 case(OCT):
00261                         new_node->types.number.value = convert_oct_string_of_size_to_long(new_node->types.number.number, strlen(new_node->types.number.number)); 
00262                         new_node->types.number.binary_string = convert_long_to_bit_string(new_node->types.number.value, new_node->types.number.binary_size);
00263                         break;
00264                 case(BIN):
00265                         new_node->types.number.value = convert_binary_string_of_size_to_long(new_node->types.number.number,  strlen(new_node->types.number.number));// a -1 is in case of x or z's
00266                         new_node->types.number.binary_string = convert_long_to_bit_string(new_node->types.number.value, new_node->types.number.binary_size);
00267                         break;
00268         }
00269 
00270         return new_node;
00271 }
00272 
00273 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274  * (function: allocate_children_to_node)
00275  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00276 void allocate_children_to_node(ast_node_t* node, int num_children, ...) 
00277 {
00278         va_list ap;
00279         int i;
00280 
00281         /* allocate space for the children */
00282         node->children = (ast_node_t**)malloc(sizeof(ast_node_t*)*num_children);
00283         node->num_children = num_children;
00284         
00285         /* set the virtual arguments */
00286         va_start(ap, num_children);
00287 
00288         for (i = 0; i < num_children; i++)
00289         {
00290                 node->children[i] = va_arg(ap, ast_node_t*);
00291         }
00292 }
00293 
00294 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00295  * (function: add_child_to_node)
00296  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00297 void add_child_to_node(ast_node_t* node, ast_node_t *child) 
00298 {
00299         /* allocate space for the children */
00300         node->children = (ast_node_t**)realloc(node->children, sizeof(ast_node_t*)*(node->num_children+1));
00301         node->num_children ++;
00302         node->children[node->num_children-1] = child;
00303 }
00304 
00305 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00306  * (function: get_range)
00307  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00308 int get_range(ast_node_t* first_node) 
00309 {
00310         long temp_value;
00311         /* look at the first item to see if it has a range */
00312         if (first_node->children[1] != NULL)
00313         {
00314                 /* IF the first element in the list has a second element...that is the range */
00315                 oassert(first_node->children[2] != NULL); // the third element should be a value
00316                 oassert((first_node->children[1]->type == NUMBERS) && (first_node->children[2]->type == NUMBERS)); // should be numbers
00317                 if(first_node->children[1]->types.number.value < first_node->children[2]->types.number.value)
00318                 {
00319                         /* swap them around */
00320                         temp_value = first_node->children[1]->types.number.value;
00321                         first_node->children[1]->types.number.value = first_node->children[2]->types.number.value;
00322                         first_node->children[2]->types.number.value = temp_value;
00323                 }
00324 
00325                 return abs(first_node->children[1]->types.number.value - first_node->children[2]->types.number.value + 1); // 1:0 is 2 spots
00326         }
00327         return -1; // indicates no range
00328 }
00329 
00330 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00331  * (function: make_concat_into_list_of_strings)
00332  *      0th idx will be the MSbit
00333  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00334 void make_concat_into_list_of_strings(ast_node_t *concat_top)
00335 {
00336         int i, j; 
00337 
00338         concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings = 0;
00339         concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = NULL;
00340 
00341         /* recursively do all embedded concats */
00342         for (i = 0; i < concat_top->num_children; i++)
00343         {
00344                 if (concat_top->children[i]->type == CONCATENATE)
00345                 {
00346                         make_concat_into_list_of_strings(concat_top->children[i]);
00347                 }
00348         }
00349                 
00350         for (i = 0; i < concat_top->num_children; i++)
00351         {
00352                 if (concat_top->children[i]->type == IDENTIFIERS)
00353                 {
00354                         char *temp_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, concat_top->children[i]->types.identifier, -1);
00355                         long sc_spot;
00356 
00357                         if ((sc_spot = sc_lookup_string(local_symbol_table_sc, temp_string)) == -1)
00358                         {
00359                                 error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, concat_top->line_number, concat_top->file_number, "Missing declaration of this symbol %s\n", temp_string);
00360                         }
00361                         free(temp_string);
00362 
00363                         if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[1] == NULL)
00364                         {
00365                                 concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings ++;
00366                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = (char**)realloc(concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings, sizeof(char*)*(concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings));
00367                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings[concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings-1] = get_name_of_pin_at_bit(concat_top->children[i], -1);
00368                         }
00369                         else if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[3] == NULL)
00370                         {
00371                                 /* reverse thorugh the range since highest bit in index will be lower in the string indx */
00372                                 for (j = ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[1]->types.number.value - ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[2]->types.number.value; j >= 0; j--)
00373                                 {
00374                                         concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings ++;
00375                                         concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = (char**)realloc(concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings, sizeof(char*)*(concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings));
00376                                         concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings[concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings-1] = get_name_of_pin_at_bit(concat_top->children[i], j);
00377                                 }
00378                         }
00379                         else if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[3] != NULL)
00380                         {
00381                                 oassert(FALSE); 
00382                         }
00383         
00384                 }
00385                 else if (concat_top->children[i]->type == ARRAY_REF)
00386                 {
00387                         concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings ++;
00388                         concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = (char**)realloc(concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings, sizeof(char*)*(concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings));
00389                         concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings[concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings-1] = get_name_of_pin_at_bit(concat_top->children[i], 0);
00390                 }
00391                 else if (concat_top->children[i]->type == RANGE_REF)
00392                 {
00393                         oassert(concat_top->children[i]->children[1]->types.number.value >= concat_top->children[i]->children[2]->types.number.value);
00394                         /* reverse thorugh the range since highest bit in index will be lower in the string indx */
00395                         for (j = concat_top->children[i]->children[1]->types.number.value - concat_top->children[i]->children[2]->types.number.value; j >= 0; j--)
00396                         {
00397                                 concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings ++;
00398                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = (char**)realloc(concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings, sizeof(char*)*(concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings));
00399                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings[concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings-1] = get_name_of_pin_at_bit(concat_top->children[i], ((concat_top->children[i]->children[1]->types.number.value - concat_top->children[i]->children[2]->types.number.value))-j);
00400                         }
00401                 }
00402                 else if (concat_top->children[i]->type == NUMBERS)
00403                 {
00404                         if(concat_top->children[i]->types.number.base == DEC)
00405                         {
00406                                 error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, concat_top->line_number, concat_top->file_number, "Concatenation can't include decimal numbers due to conflict on bits\n");
00407                         }
00408 
00409                         /* forward through list since 0th bit of a number (get_name_of_pin) is the msb */
00410                         for (j = 0; j < concat_top->children[i]->types.number.binary_size; j++)
00411                         {
00412                                 concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings ++;
00413                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = (char**)realloc(concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings, sizeof(char*)*(concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings));
00414                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings[concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings-1] = get_name_of_pin_at_bit(concat_top->children[i], j);
00415                         }
00416                 }
00417                 else if (concat_top->children[i]->type == CONCATENATE)
00418                 {
00419                         /* forward through list since we build concatenate list in idx order of MSB at index 0 and LSB at index list_size */
00420                         for (j = 0; j < concat_top->children[i]->types.concat.num_bit_strings; j++)
00421                         {
00422                                 concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings ++;
00423                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings = (char**)realloc(concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings, sizeof(char*)*(concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings));
00424                                 concat_top->types.concat.bit_strings[concat_top->types.concat.num_bit_strings-1] = get_name_of_pin_at_bit(concat_top->children[i], j);
00425                         }
00426                 }
00427         }
00428 }
00429 
00430 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00431  * (function: get_name of_port_at_bit)
00432  *      Assume module connections can be one of: Array entry, Concat, Signal, Array range reference
00433  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00434 char *get_name_of_var_declare_at_bit(ast_node_t *var_declare, int bit)
00435 {
00436         char *return_string; 
00437 
00438         /* calculate the port details */
00439         if (var_declare->children[1] == NULL)
00440         {
00441                 oassert(bit == 0);
00442                 return_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_declare->children[0]->types.identifier, -1);
00443         }
00444         else if (var_declare->children[3] == NULL)
00445         {
00446                 return_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_declare->children[0]->types.identifier, var_declare->children[2]->types.number.value+bit);
00447         }
00448         else if (var_declare->children[3] != NULL)
00449         {
00450                 /* MEMORY output */
00451                 oassert(FALSE);
00452         }
00453         
00454         return return_string;
00455 }
00456 
00457 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00458  * (function: get_name of_port_at_bit)
00459  *      Assume module connections can be one of: Array entry, Concat, Signal, Array range reference
00460  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00461 char *get_name_of_pin_at_bit(ast_node_t *var_node, int bit)
00462 {
00463         char *return_string; 
00464 
00465         if (var_node->type == ARRAY_REF)
00466         {
00467                 return_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->children[0]->types.identifier, (int)var_node->children[1]->types.number.value);
00468         }
00469         else if (var_node->type == RANGE_REF)
00470         {
00471                 oassert((var_node->children[2]->types.number.value+bit <= var_node->children[1]->types.number.value) && (var_node->children[2]->types.number.value+bit >= var_node->children[2]->types.number.value));
00472                 return_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->children[0]->types.identifier, var_node->children[2]->types.number.value+bit);
00473         }
00474         else if ((var_node->type == IDENTIFIERS) && (bit == -1))
00475         {
00476                 return_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->types.identifier, -1);
00477         }
00478         else if (var_node->type == IDENTIFIERS)
00479         {
00480                 long sc_spot;
00481                 int pin_index;
00482 
00483                 if ((sc_spot = sc_lookup_string(local_symbol_table_sc, var_node->types.identifier)) == -1)
00484                 {
00485                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, var_node->line_number, var_node->file_number, "Missing declaration of this symbol %s\n", var_node->types.identifier);
00486                 }
00487 
00488                 if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[1] == NULL)
00489                 {
00490                         pin_index = bit;
00491                 }
00492                 else if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[3] == NULL)
00493                 {
00494                         pin_index = ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[2]->types.number.value + bit; 
00495                 }
00496                 else
00497                         oassert(FALSE);
00498 
00499                 return_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->types.identifier, pin_index);
00500         }
00501         else if (var_node->type == NUMBERS)
00502         {
00503                 if (bit == -1)
00504                         bit = 0;
00505 
00506                 oassert(bit < var_node->types.number.binary_size);
00507                 if (var_node->types.number.binary_string[var_node->types.number.binary_size-bit-1] == '1')
00508                 {
00509                         return_string = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*11+1); // ONE_VCC_CNS        
00510                         sprintf(return_string, "ONE_VCC_CNS");
00511                 }
00512                 else if (var_node->types.number.binary_string[var_node->types.number.binary_size-bit-1] == '0')
00513                 {
00514                         return_string = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*13+1); // ZERO_GND_ZERO      
00515                         sprintf(return_string, "ZERO_GND_ZERO");
00516                 }
00517                 else
00518                 {
00519                         oassert(FALSE);
00520                 }
00521         }
00522         else if (var_node->type == CONCATENATE)
00523         {
00524                 if (var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings == 0)
00525                 {
00526                         oassert(FALSE);
00527                 }
00528                 else
00529                 {
00530                         if (var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings == -1)
00531                         {
00532                                 /* If this hasn't been made into a string list then do it */
00533                                 make_concat_into_list_of_strings(var_node);
00534                         }
00535 
00536                         return_string = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*strlen(var_node->types.concat.bit_strings[bit])+1);
00537                         sprintf(return_string, "%s", var_node->types.concat.bit_strings[bit]);
00538                 }
00539         }
00540         else
00541         {
00542                 oassert(FALSE);
00543         }
00544         
00545         return return_string;
00546 }
00547 
00548 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00549  * (function: get_name_of_pins
00550  *      Assume module connections can be one of: Array entry, Concat, Signal, Array range reference
00551  *      Return a list of strings
00552  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00553 char_list_t *get_name_of_pins(ast_node_t *var_node)
00554 {
00555         char **return_string; 
00556         char_list_t *return_list = (char_list_t*)malloc(sizeof(char_list_t));
00557 
00558         int i;
00559         int width;
00560 
00561         if (var_node->type == ARRAY_REF)
00562         {
00563                 width = 1;
00564                 return_string = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*));
00565                 return_string[0] = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->children[0]->types.identifier, (int)var_node->children[1]->types.number.value);
00566         }
00567         else if (var_node->type == RANGE_REF)
00568         {
00569                 width = (var_node->children[1]->types.number.value - var_node->children[2]->types.number.value+1);
00570                 return_string = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*)*width);
00571                 for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00572                 {
00573                         return_string[i] = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->children[0]->types.identifier, var_node->children[2]->types.number.value+i);
00574                 }
00575         }
00576         else if (var_node->type == IDENTIFIERS)
00577         {
00578                 /* need to look in the symbol table for details about this identifier (i.e. is it a port) */
00579                 long sc_spot;
00580                 char *temp_string = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->types.identifier, -1);
00581 
00582                 if ((sc_spot = sc_lookup_string(local_symbol_table_sc, temp_string)) == -1)
00583                 {
00584                         error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, var_node->line_number, var_node->file_number, "Missing declaration of this symbol %s\n", temp_string);
00585                 }
00586                 free(temp_string);
00587 
00588                 if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[1] == NULL)
00589                 {
00590                         width = 1;
00591                         return_string = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*)*width);
00592                         return_string[0] = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->types.identifier, -1);
00593                 }
00594                 else if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[3] == NULL)
00595                 {
00596                         int index = 0;
00597                         width = ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[1]->types.number.value - ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[2]->types.number.value + 1;
00598                         return_string = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*)*width);
00599                         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00600 //                      for (i = 0; i < ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[2]->types.number.value; i < ((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[1]->types.number.value+1; i++)
00601                         {
00602                                 return_string[index] = make_full_ref_name(NULL, NULL, NULL, var_node->types.identifier, i+((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[2]->types.number.value);
00603                                 index++;
00604                         }
00605                 }
00606                 else if (((ast_node_t*)local_symbol_table_sc->data[sc_spot])->children[3] != NULL)
00607                 {
00608                         oassert(FALSE); 
00609                 }
00610         }
00611         else if (var_node->type == NUMBERS)
00612         {
00613                 width = var_node->types.number.binary_size;
00614                 return_string = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*)*width);
00615                 for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00616                 {
00617                         /* strings are msb is 0th index in string, reverse access */
00618                         if (var_node->types.number.binary_string[var_node->types.number.binary_size-i-1] == '1')
00619                         {
00620                                 return_string[i] = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*11+1); // ONE_VCC_CNS     
00621                                 sprintf(return_string[i], "ONE_VCC_CNS");
00622                         }
00623                         else if (var_node->types.number.binary_string[var_node->types.number.binary_size-i-1] == '0')
00624                         {
00625                                 return_string[i] = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*13+1); // ZERO_GND_ZERO   
00626                                 sprintf(return_string[i], "ZERO_GND_ZERO");
00627                         }
00628                         else
00629                         {
00630                                 oassert(FALSE);
00631                         }
00632                 }
00633         }
00634         else if (var_node->type == CONCATENATE)
00635         {
00636                 if (var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings == 0)
00637                 {
00638                         oassert(FALSE);
00639                 }
00640                 else
00641                 {
00642                         if (var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings == -1)
00643                         {
00644                                 /* If this hasn't been made into a string list then do it */
00645                                 make_concat_into_list_of_strings(var_node);
00646                         }
00647 
00648                         width = var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings;
00649                         return_string = (char**)malloc(sizeof(char*)*width);
00650                         for (i = 0; i < width; i++) // 0th bit is MSB so need to access reverse
00651                         {
00652                                 return_string[i] = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*strlen(var_node->types.concat.bit_strings[var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings-i-1])+1);
00653                                 sprintf(return_string[i], "%s", var_node->types.concat.bit_strings[var_node->types.concat.num_bit_strings-i-1]);
00654                         }
00655                 }
00656         }
00657         else
00658         {
00659                 oassert(FALSE);
00660         }
00661         
00662         return_list->strings = return_string;
00663         return_list->num_strings = width;
00664 
00665         return return_list;
00666 }
00667 
00668 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00669  * (function: get_name_of_pins_with_prefix
00670  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00671 char_list_t *get_name_of_pins_with_prefix(ast_node_t *var_node, char *instance_name_prefix)
00672 {
00673         int i;
00674         char_list_t *return_list;
00675 
00676         /* get the list */
00677         return_list = get_name_of_pins(var_node);
00678 
00679         for (i = 0; i < return_list->num_strings; i++)
00680         {
00681                 return_list->strings[i] = make_full_ref_name(instance_name_prefix, NULL, NULL, return_list->strings[i], -1);
00682         }
00683 
00684         return return_list;
00685 }
